3736.verse: أَلَمْ|Do not|64|73|348$يَرَوْاْ|they see|78|95|5421$كَمْ|how many|87|104|1840$أَهْلَكْنَا|We destroyed|112|129|5422$قَبْلَهُم|before them|100|117|11274$مِّنَ|of|50|67|156$ٱلْقُرُونِ|the generations?|131|140|8775$أَنَّهُمْ|That they|86|183|461$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them|72|266|3030$لَا يَرْجِعُونَ|will not return.|128|225|153$

3733.verse: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.

3734.verse: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

3735.verse: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.

3736.verse: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

3737.verse: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.

3738.verse: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.

3739.verse: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -

3740.verse: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

3741.verse: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.

3742.verse: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.

3743.verse: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

3744.verse: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.

3745.verse: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.
